mapper.insert: insert into file (file_sid, file_type, file_origin_name, file_name, file_path, file_comment, file_upload_time, file_timestamp, user_account, file_note) values (#{fileSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileOriginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update file set file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_origin_name = #{fileOriginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_comment = #{fileComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_upload_time = #{fileUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, file_timestamp = #{fileTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_note = #{fileNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where file_sid = #{fileSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select file_sid, file_type, file_origin_name, file_name, file_path, file_comment, file_upload_time, file_timestamp, user_account, file_note from file where file_sid = #{fileSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select file_sid, file_type, file_origin_name, file_name, file_path, file_comment, file_upload_time, file_timestamp, user_account, file_note from file
